address_class_2

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • address_class_2.Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Database
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Makes a GUI for the user to enter and view AddressInfos, with search, delete, save and load methods.
    Author:
    Rowan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database()
        Zero parameter constructor for the GUI. Creates an AddressInfoCollection as well as a GUI

    • Method Detail

      • addAction

        private void addAction()
        Adds AddressInfos to the list. Requires mandatory fields, disallows duplicate names

      • alphabeticalDisplay

        private void alphabeticalDisplay()
        alphabeticalDisplay button action. Sets the text in resultsTA to a display of the list ordered by name.

      • addressDisplay

        private void addressDisplay()
        addressDisplay button action. Sets the text in resultsTA to a display of the list ordered by address.

      • searchAction

        private void searchAction()
        Search button action Searches for an AddressInfo in the list using a first, middle and last name provided by the user. Sets resultsTA to display either the AddressInfo if found or indicate it was not found.

      • deleteAction

        private void deleteAction()
        Delete button action. Searches for an AddressInfo using a first, middle and last name provided by the user. If found, enables cancel and confirm buttons and sets resultsTA to ask the user for cancel/confirm input.

      • confirmAction

        private void confirmAction()
        Action for confirm button. Deletes AddressInfo if processingDelete is set to true, saves list to file if processingSave is set to true. sets resultsTA to indicate action taken.

      • cancelAction

        private void cancelAction()
        Action for cancel button. Cancels delete or save action. Sets resultsTA to indicate action cancelled.

      • saveAction

        private void saveAction()
        Action for save button. Checks if the file name provided does not already exist - saves if so. Indicates if file cannot be saved, or triggers confirm/cancel buttons if file already exists

      • loadAction

        private void loadAction()
        Action for load button. Attempts to load file from file name given. Sets resultsTA to if file cannot be loaded, otherwise displays data loaded from file

      • makeAllButtons

        private void makeAllButtons()
        Constructs all buttons for the GUI

      • makeAllLabels

        private void makeAllLabels()
        Constructs all labels for the GUI

      • makeAllTextComponents

        private void makeAllTextComponents()
        Constructs all text components for the GUI

      • resetAllLabels

        private void resetAllLabels()
        Resets all labels to black

      • resetAllTF

        private void resetAllTF()
        resets all text fields to empty strings

      • adjustButtons

        private void adjustButtons(boolean tOrF)
        Enables/disables button sets. If true, main button set is enabled and cancel and confirm are disabled
        Parameters:
        tOrF - Indicates which button set is enabled

      • getRequiredString

        private java.lang.String getRequiredString(javax.swing.JTextField theTF,
                                           java.lang.String forErrorMsg,
                                           javax.swing.JLabel theL)
        checks and returns text from a text field needed for a button triggered action
        Parameters:
        theTF - the text field to get text from
        forErrorMsg - the field name to send to the error message if field is empty
        theL - the label for the field to set to red if the field is empty
        Returns:
        Returns the error message string to indicate if there is a missing field

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. Initializes a database
        Parameters:
        args - I have literally no idea what this is
